name: Definitely Human
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2022, discover two stories emerging together as you help Kaye uncover the truth. Reveal the secrets of the world around them in this unsettling Point and Click game.

Controls:
Move: A & D
Investigate: Left Click
Toggle Fullscreen on/off: Alt + Enter

Credits: 

Alex Morana

Allie Veneruso

Katya Sievert

Phillip Casey Holbek

Veera Warman
